<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Snare Genius](/Feats.aspx?ID=5620) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Kobold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=759" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 22 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Snare Crafting](/Feats.aspx?ID=843); Expert in [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4)

</column>

---

If the [snare](/Traits.aspx?ID=146) normally takes 1 minute to [Craft](/Actions.aspx?ID=2385), you can Craft it with 3 Interact actions instead. Each day during your daily preparations, you can prepare three snares from your formula book for quick deployment (increasing to four snares if you're a master in Crafting and five if you're legendary). Snares prepared in this way don't cost you any resources to Craft.

 When a creature critically fails its saving throw against and takes damage from the initial effect of a snare you Crafted and deployed, that creature is [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) until the end of its next turn.
name: Snare Genius
